sprykerComponent.name: form-input-default-value-disabler
sprykerComponent.readme:
Disables form fields before submitting if they have the data-default-value attribute.

Code sample

{% include molecule('form-input-default-value-disabler') with {
    attributes: {
        'form-selector': 'form-selector',
        'input-selector': 'input-selector',
        'default-value-attribute': 'default-value-attribute'
    }
} only %}

methods.name: disableInputsWithDefaultValues
methods.description: Toggles the disabled attribute and submits the form.

parameters.name: form
parameters.description: HTMLFormElement is the element for submit event.
